result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Case called: 2:35p.m.
INCLUDES 21CM995, 22CM612, and 22CM614

State appears by DDA Molly Lawrence for ADA Hannah Boeck.  Defendant appears in custody from the MCJ via Zoom video, with Attorney Heather Roehr and Attorney Krista Cannon in person.

Date and time set for initial appearance. VRCW.  
Reading Waived.  Reserve Jurisdiction. 
PLEA:  NOT GUILTY.

COURT ORDERS: $5,000.00 signature bond on all files.

CONDITIONS: 
No contact with D.A. or Downtown Pawn on 21CM995.
No contact with S.A.S. or their residence on 22CM612
Police escort to retrieve personal property from the residence - Wausau PD. 

22CM614:
- Absolute sobriety from and no possession of controlled substances except prescriptions taken as prescribed.  
- No possession of drug paraphernalia. 
- No possession or use of dangerous weapons.  
All files:
Report to ATTIC Corrections Services within one business day of release.  Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level 2 supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.  

Dates:
PTC: 8/4/22 at 9:20aj.m.
JPTC: 8/25/22 at 9:20a.m.
JSH: 12/19/22 at 9:20a.m.
JT: 1/18/23 at 9:00a.m.

ADJ: 2:41p.m.

INCLUDES 21CM995, 22CM612 & 22CM614.  No contact with victim(s):  D.A. or Downtown Pawn on 21CM995.  No contact with S.A.S. or their residenceon 22CM612.  Contact includes direct personal or physical and indirect contact by phone, in writing of any kind, entry to the person's residence or place of employment together with contacts through other persons.  Contact, however, may be made through the defendant's attorney.  Police escort to retrieve personal property from the residence - Wausau PD.  All files: Report to ATTIC Corrections Services (715-848-3202) within one business day of release. Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level (2) supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.   Additional conditions for 22CM614: Absolute sobriety from and no possession of controlled substances except prescriptions taken as prescribed. No possession of drug paraphernalia.  Defendant shall not possess or use any dangerous weapons during the pendency of this action.
